title: He's Got the Whole World in His Hands

author.name: Traditional African‑American Spiritual
author.bio: Anonymous folk spiritual that emerged in the African‑American oral tradition of the Southern United States.

lyrics:
1. He's got the whole world
In His hands,
He's got the whole world
In His hands;
He's got the whole world
In His hands,
He's got the whole world
In His hands.

2. He's got the wind and the rain
In His hands,
He's got the wind and the rain
In His hands,
He's got the wind and the rain
In His hands,
He's got the whole world
In His hands.

3. He's got the tiny little baby
In His hands,
He's got the tiny little baby
In His hands,
He's got the tiny little baby
In His hands,
He's got the whole world
In His hands.

4. He's got you and me, brother,
In His hands,
He's got you and me, sister,
In His hands,
He's got you and me, brother,
In His hands,
He's got the whole world
In His hands.
